name: Maurice: In The Predator's Nest
description:
Maurice: In The Predator's Nest is a first-person horror, survival game where players take on the role of a survivor, or a predator. You and four other survivors will do everything possible to escape and survive while a predator tracks you down and hunt you.

In Maurice: In The Predator's Nest the survivors will be given the necessary tools to be able to escape from the place, with the difficulty that their vision will be affected by the darkness of the night... Meanwhile, the predator will be given an array of abilities to track, hunt and kill his prey.
